name: Isle o'View
description:
Sometimes you just need a place to relax. Welcome to the Isle o’View. Stay for as long as you like. 

Inspired by AGameForKimi by Jasmin Stahn

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
